title: Question about Hextech Repair Tool's Ping Test
body:
- Ping Test [The ping test will test whether or not your are able to estazblish a connection to our platform and game servers]

 - In the Task Log it says 

Running ping test
Envoi d'une requˆte 'ping' sur www.google.com [216.58.205.68] avec 32 octets de donn‚esÿ:
R‚ponse de 216.58.205.68ÿ: octets=32 temps=49 ms TTL=53
R‚ponse de 216.58.205.68ÿ: octets=32 temps=49 ms TTL=53
R‚ponse de 216.58.205.68ÿ: octets=32 temps=48 ms TTL=53
R‚ponse de 216.58.205.68ÿ: octets=32 temps=48 ms TTL=53
Statistiques Ping pour 216.58.205.68:
Paquetsÿ: envoy‚s = 4, re‡us = 4, perdus = 0 (perte 0%),
Dur‚e approximative des boucles en millisecondes :
Minimum = 48ms, Maximum = 49ms, Moyenne = 48ms


* From what I can understand it says that I should have an average of [48 ms] but in game I have a around 90-80 ms I could very well be understanding it wrong
**
I would love if someone can explain it to me ^^**

replies.body: So first of all, that ping test is pinging googles servers which will return slightly different results than if you had pinged ours. A quick and simple way to check with our servers is to use our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743), or use something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and do a traceroute using this IP 104.160.131.1
